Name: Hearn Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Stirred and boozy with Green Chartreuse and bitters adding herbal spice to Irish whiskey.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Jack McGarry at The Dead Rabbit , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Hearn Cocktail contains 225 calories
